alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 6:53PM CDT until September 19 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Southeastern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 653 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Chillicothe, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chillicothe, Davidson, Medicine Mound, Fargo, Odell, and Oklaunion. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
